Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the non-disulfide-bridged peptide (NDBP) superfamily. Short an
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:S.aureus (MIC=8 uM, MBC=32 uM);Yeast:C.albicans (MIC=16 uM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Has antimicrobial activity against the Gram-positive bacteria S.aureus and the yeast C.albicans. Causes hemolysis on horse erythrocytes (64 uM for 100% hemolysis).

Literature.Title: Cationicity-enhanced analogues of the antimicrobial peptides, AcrAP1and AcrAP2, from the venom of the scorpion, Androctonus crassicauda,display potent growth modulation effects on human cancer cell lines.
Literature.Author: Du Q., Hou X., Ge L., Li R., Zhou M., Wang H., Wang L., Wei M.,Chen T., Shaw C.
